attrs.label: Image Selector
attrs.description: The image to use for Frigate.

enum.description: Normal Image
TensorRT Image
ROCm Image

attrs.label: Shared Memory Size (in MiB)
attrs.description: The size of the shared memory to use for Frigate.

attrs.label: Mount USB Bus
attrs.description: Mount the USB bus to the container.

attrs.label: Devices
attrs.description:
Devices to use for Frigate.
Eg: Host Device: /dev/apex_0, Container Device: /dev/apex_0

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

attrs.label: WebUI Port (Auth)
attrs.description: The port for Frigate WebUI

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access
Expose port for inter-container communication
None

1.2.6.readme:
Frigate

Frigate is an NVR With Realtime Object Detection for IP Cameras

Note: Coral m.2 TPU devices is not supported.
